title: Complaints Management and Escalation Procedure

changeLog.description: Updated escalation timelines and external dispute references.

content:
This procedure defines how customer complaints must be received, investigated, and resolved.

Complaints must be acknowledged within two business days and resolved within 15 business days where possible. Complex complaints require written explanation of delays.

All complaints must be logged in the centralized complaints system. Root cause analysis shall be performed quarterly.

Unresolved complaints may be escalated to the Complaints Review Committee. Customers must be informed of their right to external dispute resolution.

Complaint data is used for service improvement and regulatory reporting.
